Entry.Name: Invalid Server Certificate
Entry.Description: This app does not check the validation of X.509 certificates. This represents a critical vulnerability, enabling attackers to carry out Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attacks undetected.

Mitigation.Textual:
Avoid attempting to override checkClientTrusted, checkServerTrusted, and getAcceptedIssuers methods with empty implementations.
It's recommended to stick with the existing API instead of coming up with your own X509Certificate class. You can find further information here.
